com.valentine.esp.statemachines

Class WriteCustomSweeps

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.valentine.esp.statemachines.WriteCustomSweeps

  • public class WriteCustomSweeps
extends java.lang.Object
    This class writes the custom sweeps to the Valentine one. Is used internally by the ValentineClient Class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WriteCustomSweeps(java.util.ArrayList<SweepDefinition> _userDefintions, Devices _valentineType, ValentineESP _valentineESP, java.lang.Object _finalCallbackObject, java.lang.String _finalCallbackFunction, java.lang.Object _errorCallbackObject, java.lang.String _errorCallbackFunction)
      Initializes the WriteCustomSweeps state machine with the custom sweeps, ValentineESP object, and the success/failure callbacks.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getSweepDefinitionsFinalCallback(ResponseSweepDefinitions _resp)
      Final Callback that receives the custom sweeps written to the V1 and stores them inside of an array list before sending them to the calling objects final callback method.
      void getSweepWriteResultCallback(ResponseSweepWriteResult _resp)
      Callback that fires once the custom sweeps have been written to the V1 and returns result of the CustomSweep write.
      void Start()
      Starts writing the custom Sweeps to the V1.
      void sweepReaderErrorCallback(java.lang.Integer errCode)
      Notifies the callback objects error callback method that an error has occurred while attempting to read the custom sweep and passes in the error code.
      void sweepReaderSuccessCallback(java.util.ArrayList<SweepDefinition> _defs)
      Callback fires once we've first successfully read the sweeps from the V1.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WriteCustomSweeps

        public WriteCustomSweeps(java.util.ArrayList<SweepDefinition> _userDefintions,
                 Devices _valentineType,
                 ValentineESP _valentineESP,
                 java.lang.Object _finalCallbackObject,
                 java.lang.String _finalCallbackFunction,
                 java.lang.Object _errorCallbackObject,
                 java.lang.String _errorCallbackFunction)
        Initializes the WriteCustomSweeps state machine with the custom sweeps, ValentineESP object, and the success/failure callbacks.
        Parameters:
        _userDefintions - ArrayList of custom sweeps to be written to the V1.
        _valentineType - V1 type.
        _valentineESP - The ValentineESP object to register for various callbacks.
        _finalCallbackObject - The object thats will notified once the custom sweeps have been written.
        _finalCallbackFunction - The function that will be called once the custom sweeps have been written. {Argument must be ArrayList _defs}
        _errorCallbackObject - The object that will receive the error callback.
        _errorCallbackFunction - The function to call if there is an error writing the custom sweeps.

    • Method Detail

      • Start

        public void Start()
        Starts writing the custom Sweeps to the V1.

      • sweepReaderErrorCallback

        public void sweepReaderErrorCallback(java.lang.Integer errCode)
        Notifies the callback objects error callback method that an error has occurred while attempting to read the custom sweep and passes in the error code. (Do not call directly)
        Parameters:
        errCode - The error code returned from the V1.

      • sweepReaderSuccessCallback

        public void sweepReaderSuccessCallback(java.util.ArrayList<SweepDefinition> _defs)
        Callback fires once we've first successfully read the sweeps from the V1. This triggers the users custom sweeps to be written to the V1. (Do not call directly)
        Parameters:
        _defs - The custom sweeps that are currently in the V1 before the write.

      • getSweepWriteResultCallback

        public void getSweepWriteResultCallback(ResponseSweepWriteResult _resp)
        Callback that fires once the custom sweeps have been written to the V1 and returns result of the CustomSweep write. If there was an error during the write, it will notify the callback object of the error result index. (Do not call directly)
        Parameters:
        _resp - The result of the custom sweep write.

      • getSweepDefinitionsFinalCallback

        public void getSweepDefinitionsFinalCallback(ResponseSweepDefinitions _resp)
        Final Callback that receives the custom sweeps written to the V1 and stores them inside of an array list before sending them to the calling objects final callback method.
        Parameters:
        _resp - The sweep definition response that contains a sweep definition from the V1.
